tables.name: daily_transaction_final
tables.description: Granular toll lane transactions captured from TMS after final validation per journey.

columns.name: ihmcl_plaza_id
columns.description: Unique plaza identifier issued by IHMCL

columns.name: project_name
columns.description: Project / SPV name associated with the plaza

columns.name: plaza_name
columns.description: Toll plaza name

columns.name: final_journey_sub_type
columns.description: Journey subtype after final classification (e.g. entry, exit)

columns.name: final_journey_type
columns.description: Journey type bucket after final classification (one-way, return, exemption etc.)

columns.name: incident_action_description
columns.description: Incident/exception notes captured by lane operator

columns.name: payment_type
columns.description: Payment mode (FASTag, cash, smart card, etc.)

columns.name: exemption_category
columns.description: Exemption class if the journey was exempted

columns.name: display_class_charged
columns.description: Class shown on lane device for charged vehicle

columns.name: display_class_expected
columns.description: Expected class from toll rules for the vehicle

columns.name: lane_direction
columns.description: Traffic direction of the lane (inbound/outbound)

columns.name: lane_side
columns.description: Lane physical side (left/right/center)

columns.name: shift_id
columns.description: Operational shift identifier

columns.name: transaction_date_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was recorded (IST)

columns.name: traffic_count
columns.description: Number of vehicles for this record (typically 1)

columns.name: expected_amount
columns.description: System-calculated toll amount expected for the journey

columns.name: collected_fare_tms
columns.description: Actual fare collected as per TMS

columns.name: transaction_type
columns.description: Transaction outcome (charged, exempted, refunded, etc.)

columns.name: pcu_traffic_charged
columns.description: Charged traffic converted to Passenger Car Units

columns.name: pcu_traffic_expected
columns.description: Expected traffic in Passenger Car Units

columns.name: expected_class_id
columns.description: Identifier for expected vehicle class

columns.name: insertion_date
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was ingested into warehouse
